remarks: By quantifying only over reals, we can specify any extended real upper bound for any set of extended reals.  (Contributed by NM, 9-Apr-2006.)
statement:
xrub $p |- ( ( A C_ RR* /\ B e. RR* ) -> ( A. x e. RR ( x < B -> E. y e. A x < y ) <-> A. x e. RR* ( x < B -> E. y e. A x < y ) ) ) $.
$d A x y $.
$d B x y $.
